Uses of Class
trashday.model.Calendar

  • Packages that use Calendar 
    Package Description
    trashday.model
    Implements the Calendar object that stores the user's regular pickup schedule.
    trashday.storage
    Provides the classes necessary to store user information in the Alexa session and Amazon Dynamo DB.
    trashday.ui
    Organizes a variety of functions to handle the Alexa voice and card user interface.
    trashday.ui.responses
    Organizes all the functions that provide voice responses to the user.

    • Uses of Calendar in trashday.model

      The general pickup schedule

    • Uses of Calendar in trashday.ui

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      static String FormatUtils.verbalCalendar(Calendar calendar, LocalDateTime ldtBase)
      Create a String representation of a Calendar's recurring events that is suitable to be spoken by Alexa.
